type: Contract for Supply of Goods and Services
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Procurement of 9mm Luger (9x19mm) 147 gr. JHP Ammunition
description: The procurement is a tender for the supply of ammunition to the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), which has a long-term need for 5.7 million rounds over two years.
full_summary:
### 9mm Luger (9x19mm) 147 gr. JHP Ammunition Tender
#### Solicitation Number: WS4450650326

**Notice Details**
* Publication Date: February 23, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: July 4, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Number: 10
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 30, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: April 30, 2025

**Goods or Services Required**
Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing a bid solicitation for the supply of 9mm Luger (9x19mm) 147 gr. JHP Ammunition, with a requirement of approximately 5,453,500 rounds over a period of one year, and an additional option period of three years. The procurement does not contain a security requirement.

**Delivery Points**
Delivery points across Canada will be specified in Appendix 1 to Annex A of the bid solicitation document.

**Contact and Enquiries**
For any enquiries, please submit them to the Contracting Authority, Sebastian Ptasinskas at [sebastian.ptasinskas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sebastian.ptasinskas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) at least five (5) days prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time for response.

**Bid Documents and Process**
Bid documents can be obtained through the CanadaBuys.ca website at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

**Trade Agreements and Regions**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is available to bidders from regions across Canada.

**Classification and Category**
The classification of this procurement is 46000000 – *Defense and Law Enforcement and Security and Safety Equipment and Supplies* in the United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UPSC). The category is *Goods and Services* in the National Trade Agreement classification.

**Language of Communication and Closing Date**
The language of communication for this solicitation is English and French. All bids must be submitted in both languages.

---

__Additional Information__
* A site visit will not be required for this procurement.
* A contract of involvement covering the provision of 9mm Luger (9x19mm) 147 gr. JHP Ammunition has been published on the Government of Canada's contracting website.

**Contact Information**
Contracting Authority: Sebastian Ptasins
